projects.name: Kurdish Text-to-Speech
projects.description: A custom trained text to speech model used in our winning project 'Kurdish Sign Language Convertor' for the 2023 hackasuly Competition.

projects.name: Book Cover Generator
projects.description: A tool to generate unique book covers for books utilizing large language models (Gemini API) and image generation (Stable Diffusion).

projects.name: Dolus
projects.description: A murder-mystery game utilizing large language models to simulate the thought, emotion, and reaction of virtual characters.

projects.name: TetrisGo
projects.description: A rhythm game utilizing pose detection to make the player dance to the beat of the music to play a game of Tetris.

projects.name: Music Rewind
projects.description: A puzzle platformer game that uses rewinding powers and background music to control the level.

projects.name: Walmart Beat Saber
projects.description: A recreation of Beat Saber entirely on the web utilizing pose detection and a webcam to simulate VR interaction.

projects.name: Net Attack
projects.description: A tower defense game that uses electronic devices to teach networking concepts in a fun and novel way.

projects.name: Mirror Maze Simulation
projects.description: A mirror maze creation tool that allows you to design your own mirror maze and simulate how it will look.

projects.name: Hologram Fan Simulation
projects.description: A visual simulation of a high-speed LED hologram fan to see how to program and design one myself.

projects.name: Photo Mosaic Generator
projects.description: A tool that automatically reconstructs any photo using multiple smaller photos to create a work of art.
